meanings.definition: A type of youth detention center.
meanings.sent1: The young offender was sent to borstal for rehabilitation.
meanings.sent2: The government decided to build a new borstal in the city.
meanings.sent3: The borstal was painted in bright colors to make it less intimidating.
meanings.sent4: The idea of a borstal as a place for second chances is heartwarming.
meanings.sent5: The gates of the borstal closed behind him, marking the start of his journey towards change.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a borstal.
meanings.sent1: The borstal staff received specialized training to work with young offenders.
meanings.sent2: She wore a borstal uniform during her volunteer work at the center.
meanings.sent3: The borstal atmosphere was strict but fair, creating a structured environment.
meanings.sent4: His borstal haircut was a symbol of his time spent in the facility.
meanings.sent5: The walls were painted in borstal colors, giving the place a distinct look.
